original_text: And beyond the Jordan east of Jericho, they appointed Bezer in the wilderness on the tableland, from the tribe of Reuben, and Ramoth in Gilead, from the tribe of Gad, and Golan in Bashan, from the tribe of Manasseh.
korean_text: 여리고 동쪽 요단 저쪽 르우벤 지파 중에서 평지 광야의 베셀과 갓 지파 중에서 길르앗 라못과 므낫세 지파 중에서 바산 골란을 구별하였으니

sentences.original_text: And beyond the Jordan east of Jericho,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 요르단 강 동편 여리고 동쪽에서,

sentences.original_text: they appointed Bezer in the wilderness on the tableland,
